name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Outr — Find Out Corporations’ True Colors

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Outr is a Google Chrome extension for users to more readily understand corporations’ political donations to anti-LGBTQIA+ campaigns.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Outr works by combing through the tab currently in use to find the names of companies. If statistics exist on any corporation’s anti-LGBTQIA+ political campaign contributions, Outr will automatically display both on the Home page.

Outr supports case-insensitive querying. To scour statistics directly by the names of companies, check out the Search page.

Outr will systematically update its icon to reflect the number of matches discovered on a given tab. To see this in action, make sure to pin the extension.

Outr streamlines the process of posting to social media with pre-populated Tweets. To share your insights, press the Twitter icon next to a particular match.

Outr does not collect, share, or sell your data. All code runs locally. To learn more about Outr, head to the About page.
